    • findMonthlyRevenueByBusRouteRouteName

      @Query("select (b.totalSeats*b.fare )from Bus b,BusRoute br,Booking bo where b.busRoute=br and lower(br.routeName)=lower(:routeName) and extract (month from bo.date)=:month") java.util.List<java.lang.Float> findMonthlyRevenueByBusRouteRouteName​(@Param("routeName") java.lang.String routeName, @Param("month") int month)

    • getRevenueByBusRouteAndDate

    • getYearlyRevenueByBusRoute
